mapper.sql: code, date, open, high, close, low, volume, price_change, p_change, ma5, ma10, ma20, v_ma5, v_ma10, v_ma20, turnover
mapper.select:
select
from kstock where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CONVERT (date,DATE)
mapper.insert: insert into kstock (code, date, open, high, close, low, volume, price_change, p_change, ma5, ma10, ma20, v_ma5, v_ma10, v_ma20, turnover) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{open,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{high,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{close,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{low,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ma5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ma10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ma20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vMa5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vMa10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vMa20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{turnover,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update kstock set date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open = #{open,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, high = #{high,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, close = #{close,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, low = #{low,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_change = #{priceChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_change = #{pChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ma5 = #{ma5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ma10 = #{ma10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ma20 = #{ma20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_ma5 = #{vMa5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_ma10 = #{vMa10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_ma20 = #{vMa20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, turnover = #{turnover,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
